# 1. 准备数据集
```{r}
library(ISLR)
# install.packages("boot")
library(boot)
xy.fn <- function(data, index) {
  x = data$X[index];
  y = data$Y[index];
  return ((var(y) - cov(x, y)) / (var(x) + var(y) - 2 * cov(x, y)))
}
xy.fn(Portfolio, 1:100)
```
# 2. boot 测试
```{r}
xy.fn(Portfolio, 1:100)
boot(Portfolio, xy.fn, R = 1000)
```
# 3. 模拟一次 boot
```{r}
xy.fn <- function(data, index) {
  SP = sample(100, index, replace = T);
  x = data$X[SP];
  y = data$Y[SP];
  return((var(y) - cov(x, y)) / (var(x) + var(y) - 2 * cov(x, y)))
}
xy.fn(Portfolio, 100)
```
